page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: In the Play Scheme you go on outings to{Sunderland Leisure Centre}and a lot of other places.You play {football,rounders and cricket.}The Play Scheme is on every year at the Boy's Club.We have refreshments and sweets to buy.For games inside the building we play all sorts of games in the gym.We draw and paint inside the building.Sometimes we have a treasure hunt where one of the leaders goes around Bowburn hiding clues.Last year we had a visit to the I-tec computer centre.Usually it is on the start of the third week of the Summer Holidays. We sometimes go to Durham Ice Rink.We went twice last year.
